entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow at times in the morning and afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
